metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16092 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Symonics libmysofa 0.7 has a NULL pointer dereference in getHrtf in hrtf/reader.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16092` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysofa-utils - 0.8~dfsg0-1
libmysofa0 - 0.8~dfsg0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmysofa package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8~dfsg0-1').
